svg.script: // This image has no preserveAspectRatio attribute, so in the bonus // image element, we'll actually apply the value that comes along with // "defer" ("xMinYMin slice"). var grid = generateImageGrid("blueRect10x10-viewBox.svg", 40, 20, "defer xMinYMin slice"); grid.setAttribute("transform", "translate(10, 10)"); document.documentElement.appendChild(grid);
